column4: i had a radeon 9600 pro AIW installed a month ago on this computer.... no problems at all, ubuntu 6.06
did you play any games with it?
i would stick to what you know
ati can definatley rock the boat, its like the amd vs intell war... one year one is on top, the other is the ladder...   i usualy root for the underdog tho
i can play doom 3 just fine on my amd k7, and my older ati card...
i can tell you doom3 was made for nvida though
thats like a road being made for only a ford...
you can enable root logon by giving it a password
but of course ubuntu fanatics would advise against it
advise against what... what you just told me??   why, and whats the alternative?
: just goto a terminal and type the latter.
: any changes you make can be destructive so be careful.
